fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Send a player into crippling debt, causing them to become __Desperate__.
__Control__ a Desperate player. They will become __Paid__ for their services.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
The first time you are attacked, your bodyguards will defend you with Invincible defense against all attacks, they will not come to your aid the second time around.
The first time you are lynched, a Paid player will be lynched instead of you if available, if not, you die.

fields.name: Status Effects:
fields.value:
__Desperate__: Player gains Vulnerable defense until Paid.
__Control__: Reveal's the players role, and forces them into your second target.
__Paid__: Player has won the game, regardless of wincondition fulfillment.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See to it that three Paid players win, where they would not have otherwise.
